column2: Just a little ways further lads!
Truly an act of cowardice to back down like this.
We can take them now that we regrouped!
Living another day to fight, and return to our family, seems the wisest choice.
We can regroup for a better assault!
There is no way for us to be defeated here, as the Republic will ensure we see things through.
No sense in going back and joining those other saps in the grave.
Foreboding fills the air, swimming through the debris.
